data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rG-b7yjX3_8Q7kNvgEJ9Rdn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCp5WUnv5OBOEukK8Qls309_JxXOlcTdOyN-j2b5pI2qA&oe=664B349C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=c2_Z8mXlllwQ7kNvgGzyqDE&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9smd1OfGusery0f5946O2LhCN-f901XMSsLGVeD0ZPg&oe=664B3E24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Dkoede4OYQ8Q7kNvgEdgW9K&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAKNUcv5wAAjUSFhTIcXzIl42wtNPWEzsnWLXn3NT3YoQ&oe=664B2587)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I8mEHjozjX4Q7kNvgHmxlLx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBsKSE8kMvR0uUjszkvnQTOBNMADhiQJx3vz-7hzY5KTg&oe=664B1866)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=O9GjSl2ONd0Q7kNvgEh7YHl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA7PLQOH1_JpQNCLRSv-bsE0JFWbn0sIAfneoYaxnr10g&oe=664B44D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7N-BGGbK6_sQ7kNvgE_x_YH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC4Y6JRS7C7tzQyF73u4cy4fhYjEdF0HMjG5sttq6_MwQ&oe=664B4159)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bH39R1FomLsQ7kNvgEQ4zIR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBiHa0cnDDmriiorx4hpDzwhO3I7RuMbKREKrgo-7272Q&oe=664B2770)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6aAVK6OauDsQ7kNvgEh-rf3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCs2JSqXRbLmEAC6WjPjfEyX43QuGrLWHDsrRiF3PhbdQ&oe=664B11EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=yAk9Na8lCV8Q7kNvgGIuQqb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_1CP-WDagQgdfD159TKe7u1EJx_y8Jk5GMOmoH7oXFg&oe=664B2597)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QUIHe6jD-58Q7kNvgGyDfdu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBTSprq3_4GLk4KCRgDkhJUSJz3fH8Oiu0TOyo_13-4gQ&oe=664B410C)
